Product - Class in Model
A mirror of the "product" table from the "schooldb" database.
Product() - Constructor for class Model.Product
The empty constructor is used by the SQL queries.
Product(String, int, double) - Constructor for class Model.Product
A parameterized constructor is used to create an instance of a product with the following pre-set fields.
productBLL - Variable in class Controller.ProductGUIController
 
ProductBLL - Class in BusinessLogic
Based on the request of the controller, it manages the raw input given, validates it, transforms it into essential product data and then applies one of the CRUD operations

Initializes the product data access object

ProductGUIController - Class in Controller
